channel.title: 508 davidscape help! (Summoning)
channel.description:
hi guys ;D i was wondering if any one of you could help me with:
making my summoned npc's attack the monster/player i attack .. and while it is dammaging give it summoning xp ?
i would be happy if anyone of you could help me with this ;)!

item.title: 508 davidscape help! (Summoning)
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“Zerk P0wer, post:2, topic:413146”]change your topic name. its advertiseing[/quote]HAHA? No this is not advertising. He is clearly not advertising any server and this server is still being hosted by Davidi2. Its the name of a 508 base he downloaded and this is how people know what base it is and how to help them.
